title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message:
SEE told me they dont have 
216-XJBKA15FG but they have new 
216-MJBKA15FG and they are 100% compatible. Is that correct?

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message: I have swapped them with success.

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message: Success for how long time? In my case 216-XJBKA15FG worked 2 weeks. I replaced it again and worked 1 week. How many time worked for you 216-MJBKA15FG??

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message: Done a few, no issues. What kind of flux are you using?

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message: Amtech NC-559 blue bottle from ebay.

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message:
Yeah Amtech flux made in USA straight from China. What do you think yourself? I had so many issues with garbage flux. It is fine if you clean in 100%, but any residue will start to conduct after a few weeks.

This also means all rework that you did with this flux is now out there slowly corroding away. I had this exact problem 5 years ago with cheap ass China flux and had to do 100s of repairs all over again :(

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message:
Wow, cannot belive this was the problem!!! What is the solutoin?

1. Use same flux and clean very well after that?
2. Use original flux from trusted provider? Any recomendation?

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message: Spend money and use REAL stuff and that does not come China.

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message:
[QUOTE="MDY, post: 19762"]Wow, cannot belive this was the problem!!! What is the solutoin?

1. Use same flux and clean very well after that?
2. Use original flux from trusted provider? Any recomendation?[/QUOTE]

A perfect opportunity to buy from Louis, I guess....

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 19744"] I had this exact problem 5 years ago with cheap ass China flux and had to do 100s of repairs all over again :([/QUOTE]

If you had this problem I belive could be some problem with flux, but dont understand why all 0005 chips never come back to me?

You had problems with new gpu replacment?

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message: Pretty much all repairs were coming back when I was using that garbage China flux. Usually 2 weeks to a months for most.

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message: What I noted in my case is iMAC first time they come to me, come with white screen or scratch on screens. When I put new GPU they always comes to me with black screen. Is that what happened to you?

title: Imac gpu  216-XJBKA15FG
message: Nope, these were mostly PC laptops years ago. Not many issues with iMacs right now. Just sucks to get good GPUs. But GPUs failing in 1-2 weeks is pretty certain not a GPU problem. Even the reballed fake shit will last a few months.
